import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' const Demo = () => { const [iwo, setIwo] = useState("") const [client, setClient] = useState("") const [die, setDie] = useState("") useEffect(() => { console.log(iwo) }, [iwo]) const onIwoChange = (e) => { setIwo(e.target.value) } const onClientChange = (e) => { setClient(e.target.value) const newValue = Number(e.target.value) + Number(iwo) setDie(newValue) } const onDieChange = (e) => { setDie(e.target.value) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const data = { iwo,client,die } console.log(data); } return (
